name: Eight Marbles 2X
description: Eight Marbles 2x is a fast paced 2D fighting game that was made using 2D Fighter Maker. It uses a 6 button layout with 3 buttons used as shortcuts for special attacks. Most would be on board with the concept until they discover a common theme in the gameplay itself: Most characters on the roster battle each other with Onara (Flatulence), though if you happen to know of the game's existence in the first place then that likely doesn't bother you. As well as original characters, there are guest characters present on the roster from various other related fetish media.
